metadata.description: New equipment path exercises for MuscleMap

swimming.name: Freestyle Sprint
swimming.cues: High elbow catch | Hip rotation | Strong kick | Bilateral breathing

swimming.name: Freestyle Endurance
swimming.cues: Relaxed stroke | Efficient catch | Steady pace | Long body line

swimming.name: Backstroke
swimming.description: Supine swimming stroke emphasizing shoulder rotation
swimming.cues: Pinky first entry | Hip rotation | Head still | Strong kick

swimming.name: Breaststroke
swimming.cues: Outsweep then insweep | Heels to butt | Glide phase | Head follows hands

swimming.name: Butterfly
swimming.description: Simultaneous arm recovery with dolphin kick
swimming.cues: Chest press down | Hips up | Two kicks per stroke | Arms wide recovery

swimming.name: Flutter Kick Drill
swimming.description: Isolated kicking with board or streamline
swimming.cues: Kick from hips | Pointed toes | Small fast kicks | Core engaged

swimming.name: Pull Buoy Freestyle
swimming.description: Upper body focused swimming with pull buoy
swimming.cues: No kicking | High elbow | Strong catch | Hip rotation from core

swimming.name: Catch-Up Drill
swimming.description: One arm waits while other completes full stroke
swimming.cues: Touch hands before next stroke | Long glide | Focus on catch | Patient timing

swimming.name: 25m All-Out Sprint
swimming.description: Maximum velocity swimming for one length
swimming.cues: Explosive start | Fast turnover | No breathing or minimal | All-out effort

swimming.name: Eggbeater Treading
swimming.description: Vertical position water polo style treading
swimming.cues: Alternating circular kicks | Hands sculling | Core upright | Head above water

pole.name: Basic Pole Climb
pole.description: Climbing the pole using arms and legs
pole.cues: Grip high | Knees squeeze | Push with legs | Pull with arms

pole.name: Fireman Spin
pole.description: Basic spin with inside leg hook
pole.cues: Strong grip | Inside leg hooks | Outside leg extends | Control descent

pole.name: Chair Spin
pole.cues: Hook inside knee | Outside leg extends | Lean back | Strong arm grip

pole.name: Basic Invert
pole.cues: Strong grip | Tuck knees | Engage core | Hook legs | Control

pole.name: Crucifix Hold
pole.description: Arms extended horizontal hold on pole
pole.cues: Grip with legs | Arms out | Core tight | Shoulder engagement

pole.name: Floor Work Waves
pole.cues: Initiate from chest | Roll through spine | Hip circles | Fluid movement

pole.name: Pole Sit-Up
pole.description: Hanging from pole, curl body up
pole.cues: Grip secure | Tuck knees | Curl up | Control down

pole.name: Leg Hang
pole.description: Hanging upside down from legs only
pole.cues: Strong leg grip | Arms release | Core engaged | Pointed toes

pole.name: Shoulder Mount
pole.cues: Shoulder against pole | Core lifts legs | Hip power | Control inversion

pole.name: Jade Split
pole.description: Split position while inverted on pole
pole.cues: Secure leg grip | Open to split | Core stability | Flexibility required

equestrian.name: Posting Trot Drill
equestrian.description: Rise and sit with the horses trot rhythm
equestrian.cues: Push from stirrups | Hip forward | Soft landing | Core stable

equestrian.name: Two-Point Hold
equestrian.description: Hovering above saddle in jumping position
equestrian.cues: Weight in heels | Chest forward | Soft knees | Core engaged

equestrian.name: No Hands Balance
equestrian.description: Riding without reins to develop independent seat
equestrian.cues: Arms out or on hips | Sit deep | Follow movement | No gripping

equestrian.name: Sitting Trot
equestrian.cues: Heavy seat bones | Absorb with core | Elastic lower back | Quiet hands

equestrian.name: Leg Yield Drill
equestrian.description: Moving horse laterally with inside leg
equestrian.cues: Inside leg at girth | Outside leg behind | Slight flexion | Maintain forward

equestrian.name: Half-Halt Hold
equestrian.description: Core engagement drill for collection cues
equestrian.cues: Brace core | Close fingers | Sit tall | Release forward

equestrian.name: Canter Seat Drill
equestrian.cues: Hips follow | Shoulders back | Inside hip leads | Elastic elbows

equestrian.name: Hip Opener Stretch
equestrian.description: Stretching hip flexors for better position
equestrian.cues: Long hip flexor | Open inner thigh | Tall spine | Breathe deep

equestrian.name: Jumping Position Hold
equestrian.cues: Crest release | Eyes up | Heels down | Fold at hip

equestrian.name: Rein Contact Exercise
equestrian.cues: Thumbs on top | Elastic elbow | Straight line to bit | Quiet hands

cycling.name: Seated Sprint Interval
cycling.cues: High cadence | Core stable | Pull on bars | Smooth circles

cycling.name: Seated Climb
cycling.cues: Heavy gear | Slow cadence | Push through heels | Steady power

cycling.name: Standing Climb
cycling.cues: Rock bike side to side | Arms pull | Core engaged | Rhythm

cycling.name: High Cadence Spin
cycling.cues: Smooth pedal stroke | No bouncing | 100+ RPM | Relaxed upper body

cycling.name: Power Intervals
cycling.cues: Explosive start | Max watts | 15-30 seconds | Full recovery

cycling.name: Endurance Ride
cycling.cues: Conversational pace | Relaxed grip | Steady cadence | Long duration

cycling.name: Tempo Effort
cycling.cues: Comfortably hard | 20-60 minutes | Focused effort | Aero position

cycling.name: Single Leg Drills
cycling.description: One leg pedaling to improve stroke
cycling.cues: Unclip one foot | Smooth circles | Pull up and over | Alternate legs

cycling.name: Aero Position Hold
cycling.cues: Low back flat | Elbows in | Head neutral | Core engaged

cycling.name: Over-Unders
cycling.cues: 2 min under | 1 min over | Repeat | Recovery between sets

climbing.name: Dead Hang
climbing.description: Passive hang from bar or hangboard
climbing.cues: Shoulders engaged | Straight arms | Full grip | Breathe

climbing.name: Half Crimp Hang
climbing.description: Hangboard hang in half crimp position
climbing.cues: 90 degree finger bend | No thumb wrap | 10 second holds | Full rest

climbing.name: Lock-Off
climbing.description: Hold at various angles during pull-up
climbing.cues: Pull to position | Hold 5 seconds | Control descent | Alternate angles

climbing.name: Campus Board Ladders
climbing.description: Alternating hand movements up campus board
climbing.cues: Explosive movement | Latch rung | Feet off | Controlled descent

climbing.name: Front Lever Progression
climbing.cues: Tuck to full | Straight body | Core maximum | Shoulder depression

climbing.name: Push-Up (Antagonist)
climbing.cues: Full range | Elbows 45 degrees | Core tight | Prevent climber hunch

climbing.name: Finger Rolls
climbing.cues: Roll to fingertips | Curl back | Light weight | High reps

climbing.name: Shoulder Stabilization
climbing.cues: External rotation | Internal rotation | Scapular pulls | Light resistance

climbing.name: Body Tension Drill
climbing.cues: Hang on holds | Lift feet to holds | Maintain tension | No swing

climbing.name: Bouldering Session
climbing.cues: Read beta | Attempt problem | Rest fully | Project or circuit

rowing.name: Steady State Row
rowing.cues: Rate 18-22 | Full leg drive | Relaxed recovery | Breathe rhythmically

rowing.name: 500m Intervals
rowing.cues: Strong start | Settle into rhythm | Negative split | Full recovery

rowing.name: Power Strokes
rowing.cues: Rate 16-18 | Maximum leg drive | Explosive push | Full body

rowing.name: 2K Test Piece
rowing.cues: High 10 start | Settle rate 30-34 | Negative split | Sprint finish

rowing.name: Rate Pyramid
rowing.cues: Start at 20 | Build to 28 | Come back down | Maintain power

rowing.name: Legs Only Drill
rowing.description: Rowing with arms straight, legs only
rowing.cues: Arms extended | Drive with legs | Body follows | Quick catch

rowing.name: Arms Only Drill
rowing.description: Rowing with legs straight, arms only
rowing.cues: Legs flat | Pull to chest | Elbows past body | Quick hands away

rowing.name: Pause Drills
rowing.description: Pausing at various points in stroke
rowing.cues: Pause at catch | Pause at finish | Check body position | Smooth restart

rowing.name: Sprint Start 10
rowing.description: Race start high stroke rate burst
rowing.cues: Three-quarter slide starts | Build to full | Rate 38-42 | Settle after

rowing.name: Minute On/Minute Off
rowing.cues: Hard minute max effort | Easy minute recover | Maintain form | Repeat
